inclusion.criterion: Attending weight management clinic at Yale New Haven Hospital
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Good general health, taking no other medication on a chronic basis
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Age 13 to 17 yrs in puberty (girls: breast Tanner stage II to IV, and boys: testes size > 6 ml)
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: The presence of insulin resistance, defined by fasting insulin levels greater than 30 µU/ml, and HOMA insulin resistance index > 6
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Normal glucose tolerance based on a 2-hr plasma glucose (<140 mg/dl) after the OGTT.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: All female subjects must have a negative urine pregnancy test during the study visits and must use an effective method of contraception if they are sexually active. Without their parent(s) present, all potential female subjects will be asked about their sexual activity and the specific form of contraception they are using.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: The patient is a 32-year-old obese woman who came to the clinic with weight concerns. She is 165 cm tall and her weight is 113 kg.
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: She is complaining of sleep apnea, PCO and dissatisfaction with her body shape.
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: She likes to try diets and exercise to lose weight.
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Hepatic disease with elevated liver function test (ALT or AST) ≥ 2 X the upper limits of normal
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Presence of other endocrinopathies; except treated hypothyroidism on stable replacement doses of thyroid hormone
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Presence of cardiac, pulmonary or other significant chronic illness
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Adolescents with psychiatric disorder, claustrophobia or with substance abuse
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Recent use (within six months) of anorexic agents
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: The patient is a 32-year-old obese woman who came to the clinic with weight concerns. She has sleep apnea and PCO, but her overall health appears good.
